name: FetchPlayerStreamerPlaybackGrant
description: **This method is not enabled.** Returns a single PlaybackGrant resource identified by a SID.

Sid.description: The SID of the PlayerStreamer resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created this resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**grant**: The grant that authorizes the player sdk to connect to the livestream
**sid**: The unique string generated to identify the PlayerStreamer resource that this PlaybackGrant authorizes views for.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
